name: Death Defied
description:
Death's realm grows empty and so does his mood, the modern age and its medicine is stifling the flow of his ghostly citizens into the underworld where he reigns. So when your small little paper bag wearing soul stumbles before the feet of Death himself, the lord of the Dead comes up with a plan to amuse his ancient being. "I dream of a day where I shall laugh again, so, little apparition, if you can amuse these old bones of mine with hilarious antics and find all 7 ways to die, I shall return your petty little soul to the living realm. Go forth little ghost, and die." With the motivation to return to your warm life above the dark ground, you step forth into Deaths little game. Welcome to Death Defied!

Made in 3 days for Wowie! jam 3.0
